member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource
member.summary: Event source based logger to log different events.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource.Logger
member.summary: Static logger that is exposed externally. An external application or framework can hook up a listener to this event source to log data in a custom way.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource.ShowPII
member.summary: Flag which indicates whether or not PII is shown in logs. False by default.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource.HiddenPIIString
member.summary: String that is used in place of any arguments to log messages if the 'ShowPII' flag is set to false.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource.HeaderWritten
member.summary: Indicates whether or the log message header (contains library version, date/time, and PII debugging information) has been written.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource._versionLogMessage
member.summary: The log message that indicates the current library version.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource._dateLogMessage
member.summary: The log message that indicates the date.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource._piiOffLogMessage
member.summary: The log message that is shown when PII is off.

member.name: F:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource._piiOnLogMessage
member.summary: The log message that is shown when PII is off.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource.WriteAlways(System.String)
member.summary: Writes an event log by using the provided string argument and current UTC time. No level filtering is done on the event.
member.param: The log message.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource.WriteAlways(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Writes an event log by using the provided string argument, current UTC time and the provided arguments list.
member.param: The log message.
An object array that contains zero or more objects to format.

member.summary: Writes a verbose event log by using the provided string argument and current UTC time.
member.param: The log message.

An object array that contains zero or more objects to format.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelEventSource.LogLevel
member.summary: Minimum log level to log events. Default is Warning.

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelTelemetryUtil
member.summary: Provides a way to add and remove telemetry data.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelTelemetryUtil.ClientSku
member.summary: Get the string that represents the client SKU.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelTelemetryUtil.ClientVer
member.summary: Get the string that represents the client version.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelTelemetryUtil.AddTelemetryData(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a key and its value to the collection of telemetry data.
member.param: The name of the telemetry.
The value of the telemetry.
member.returns: true if the key is successfully added; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.IdentityModelTelemetryUtil.RemoveTelemetryData(System.String)
member.summary: Removes a key and its value from the collection of telemetry data.
member.param: The name of the telemetry.
member.returns: true if the key is successfully removed; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.LoggerContext
member.summary: A context class that can be used to store work per request to aid with debugging.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.LoggerContext.#ctor
member.summary: Instantiates a new with the default activityId.

member.name: M:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.LoggerContext.#ctor(System.Guid)
member.summary: Instantiates a new with an activityId.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.LoggerContext.ActivityId
member.summary: Gets or set a that will be used in the call to EventSource.SetCurrentThreadActivityId before logging.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.LoggerContext.CaptureLogs
member.summary: Gets or sets a boolean controlling if logs are written into the context. Useful when debugging.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.LoggerContext.DebugId
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that helps with setting breakpoints when debugging.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.LoggerContext.Logs
member.summary: The collection of logs associated with a request. Use to control capture.

member.name: P:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.LoggerContext.PropertyBag
member.summary: Gets or sets an that enables custom extensibility scenarios.

member.summary: Log messages and codes for Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging

member.name: T:Microsoft.IdentityModel.Logging.NonPII
member.summary: An internal structure that is used to mark an argument as NonPII. Arguments wrapped with a NonPII structure will be considered as NonPII in the message logging process.

member.summary: Argument wrapped with a structure is considered as NonPII in the message logging process.

member.summary: Creates an instance of that wraps the .
member.param: An argument that is considered as NonPII.

member.summary: Returns a string that represents the .
member.returns: Null if the is null, otherwise calls method of the .

member.summary: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.
